scripts.test:chrome: npm run tsc && testcafe chrome --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js
scripts.test:ff: npm run tsc && testcafe firefox --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js
scripts.test:short:h: npm run tsc && testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iphone X" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iphone X" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iPad" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iPhone 6/7/8" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=Pixel 2 XL" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=Galaxy S5" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js
scripts.test:all:h: npm run tsc && testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iphone X" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iphone X" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iPad Pro" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iPad" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iPhone 6/7/8" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iPhone 5/SE" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=Pixel 2 XL" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=Pixel 2" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=Galaxy S5" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js
scripts.test:short: npm run tsc && testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iphone X" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iphone X" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iPad" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iPhone 6/7/8" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=Pixel 2 XL" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=Galaxy S5" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:ff ; npm run tsc && testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iphone X" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iphone X" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iPad Pro" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iPad" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iPhone 6/7/8" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iPhone 5/SE" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=Pixel 2 XL" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=Pixel 2" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=Galaxy S5" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js
scripts.test:custom-emulator: npm run tsc && testcafe "chrome:emulation:width=360;height=700;mobile=true;orientation=vertical;touch=true" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js
scripts.test:custom-emulator-h: npm run tsc && testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iphone X;cdpPort=9223" --speed 1 -S -s screenshots ts_out/index.js
